title: Sketch Class: On Line—Marks and Linear Codes
description:
Six Saturdays
January 5 - February 9
10:45–12:45 

This class is for people ages 16 and up. 

Explore the myriad manifestations of hand-made marks and lines. In this six week course, participants will examine the expressive capabilities of line to move the eye, engage a subject, and create a form. 

Multi-session sketch classes offer the chance to draw in the museum's galleries under the guidance of experienced instructors. All materials will be provided. Although all levels are welcome, participants in this particular course may find it helpful to have some experience with drawing.

Click here to see all upcoming sketch classes and workshops. For additional information, please call (312) 443-3680 or email museum-programs@artic.edu.

Persons with disabilities who would like to request an accessibility accommodation for an Art Institute program are encouraged to send an e-mail to access@artic.edu as far in advance as possible.
